name: ecmascript-parser-benchmark
description: Compares the speed and package size of various ECMAScript parsers and code generators.
author: Ferdinand Prantl <prantlf@gmail.com>

scripts.start:parser: npm run start:parser:script && npm run start:parser:module
scripts.start:parser:locations: npm run start:parser:script:locations && npm run start:parser:module:locations
scripts.start:parser:all: npm run start:parser && npm run start:parser:locations
scripts.start:generator:all: npm run start:generator && npm run start:generator:sourcemap
scripts.start:sizes: package-size esprima acorn @babel/parser meriyah seafox kataw @azariasb/escaya tenko
scripts.start: npm run start:parser:all && npm run start:generator:all && npm run start:sizes
scripts.version: npx conventional-changelog-cli -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
